sys_script_fix.name: Get Global Tasks

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_fix_f38f0bda2fd2201054daa1fef699b6d6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description/><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>Get Global Tasks</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[var current = getRecord('5eb1ea012fd2201054daa1fef699b6d6');

var gr = new GlideRecord("x_357097_myteam_myteam_task");
gr.addEncodedQuery("global_task=true^team_member=6b1396122f52201054daa1fef699b68b");
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
    insertCopy(gr);

}

function insertCopy(gr) {
    var copy = new GlideRecord("x_357097_myteam_myteam_task");
    copy.initialize();
    copy.number = "";
    copy.short_description = gr.short_description;
	copy.team_member = current;
	copy.insert();
}

function getRecord(u) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord("x_357097_myteam_colleague_profile");
    return gr;

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adm.gareth.price</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-15 14:42:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>f38f0bda2fd2201054daa1fef699b6d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Global Tasks</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MyTeam" source="x_357097_myteam">4fce6d492f12201054daa1fef699b61c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MyTeam">4fce6d492f12201054daa1fef699b61c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_f38f0bda2fd2201054daa1fef699b6d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adm.gareth.price</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-15 14:42:56</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
